org.logl.log4j2

Class Log4j2LoggerProvider

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.logl.log4j2.Log4j2LoggerProvider
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    LoggerProvider

    public class Log4j2LoggerProvider
extends java.lang.Object
implements LoggerProvider
    An implementation of a LoggerProvider that delegates to org.apache.logging.log4j.LogManager.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Log4j2LoggerProvider()
      Create a logger provider that uses LogManager.getLogger(String) for obtaining a logger.
